summary: Zatoichi is mistaken for a thief. To clear his name he must find and defeat the real villain.
cast: Shintarô Katsu|Shôgo Shimada|Mikiko Tsubouchi|Machiko Hasegawa|Tomisaburô Wakayama|Tatsuya Ishiguro|Shinjirô Asano|Saburô Date|Hikosaburo Kataoka|Tanbâ Matasaburô|Toranosuke Tennoji|Kôichi Mizuhara|Hiroshi Hayashi|Yûsaku Terashima|Ichirô Takakura|Kenjirô Uemura
title: Zatôichi senryô-kubi
